div.div:
Data signed - the body bytes (if a
Ed25519 key); or the keccak256 hash of the body bytes (if a ECDSA key)

div.div:
Signature - the (alleged) output of the Ed25519 or
ECDSA signing algorithm using the implied
private key on the given data
